import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./login-modal.css" import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faTwitter, faFacebookF, faGoogle } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons" function LoginModal(props){ const { t } = useTranslation() const handleClose = (event) => { if(event.target === event.currentTarget) props.handleHideLogin() } const handleLoginFacebook = () => { props.setIsLoggedIn("facebook") console.log("logged in?",props.isLoggedIn) } const handleLoginTwitter = () => { props.setIsLoggedIn("twitter") console.log("logged in?",props.isLoggedIn) } const handleLoginGoogle = () => { props.setIsLoggedIn("google") console.log("logged in?",props.isLoggedIn) } return(
) } export default LoginModal
